resources.string:
Kari Brooke Jobe (born April 6, 1981) is an American contemporary Christian music singer and songwriter.
 Since her first album in 2009, she has received one Grammy Award nomination and three Dove Award nominations,
 two of which she won.
 Jobe is also a worship pastor at Gateway Church,
 a charismatic megachurch in Southlake, Texas.

In August 2014, Jobe confirmed via Instagram that she became engaged to fellow Christian artist Cody Carnes.
 Jobe married Cody Carnes on November 21, 2014.
 The couple revealed they are expecting their first child in February 2016.

On the red carpet at the Dove Awards 2015, Jobe announced she and her husband are expecting a son.\n On February 18, 2016, Kari gave birth to her son named Canyon Morrison Caine Carnes.\n The child was born 9 pounds and 13 ounces in weight and 22.5 inches tall.
